title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D1EndCondition
description: Gets or sets how to specify the spacing of pattern instances in Direction 1 of this linear pattern feature.
returns: Spacing of pattern instances in Direction 1 as defined in swPatternEndCondition_e
remarks:
For more information, see the
Linear Patterns and the Linear Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
